org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol
Interface RequestProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectionRequestProcessor, EntryRequestProcessor, MediaRequestProcessor
public interface RequestProcessor

Request processors implement the actual business logic for handling requests to the Atompub server and producing the related response.

Method Summary
<S extends ResponseContext>
S
process(RequestContext requestContext, WorkspaceManager workspaceManager, CollectionAdapter collectionAdapter)
          Provide the actual request processing logic.
 

Method Detail

process

<S extends ResponseContext> S process(RequestContext requestContext,
                                      WorkspaceManager workspaceManager,
                                      CollectionAdapter collectionAdapter)
Provide the actual request processing logic.

Parameters:
requestContext - The AtompubRequestContext object, holding information about the request to process.
workspaceManager - The AtompubWorkspaceManager object, holding information useful for request processing.
collectionAdapter - The AtompubCollectionAdapter object, holding information useful for request processing; may be null if not needed.
Returns:
A AtompubResponseContext object, as resulted from the request processing.
